ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: *Teltoli sighs as she hears Plintissa asking if she was going to join* No, I am not going to join, sorry. I will stick with the Maximals for now. Liono Prime

*Teltoli sighs as she hears Plintissa asking if she was going to join* 

"No, I am not going to join, sorry. I will stick with the Maximals for now. Liono Prime may be a fool but the others are not"

*She tosses up a peice of metal to the bot, so she can use it for the roof and the radar holder*

"You know, Tissa, I really admire your cause. I wouldn't do something like this" *She laughs* "To make another group is gonna be one big project!"

------Original Message------
From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 19, 2000 4:44:04 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


"i don't mind, but are you sure you want to be with me? i fight for the
Maximals, but stand for my own purpoises...." Plintissa said.... "well, you
can hand me those pieces there while i'm on the roof so that i won't have to
climb down for every piece...and thanks for helping me, i was in a bind..."
she said..she climbed up to the roof with a piece and put it on......it was
a holder for radar.....

----- Original Message -----
From: "Teltoli SilverFlight" <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 7:06 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> *Teltoli giggles, then gets serious again* "Alright! What do I do, Tissa?
Can I call you Tissa? Whole lot easier!"
